name: Chef Pop: Bubble World
description:
Meet the CHEF who's traveling all over the world to explore all recipes

Here is some bubbling fun challenging bubble shooter game and cooking game experience with recipes that you can enjoy with your friends!

If you feel like poping out some bubbles and you want to cook special food , this is the challenge you've been waiting for!

Better than any pop-up or matching game you might have played until now, this time you'll be a Chef traveling around the world to explore fine food but for that you need to release the ingredients trapped by an evil CHEF.
Every level comes with its obstacles and you might get to find them more difficult or hard to clear, but with skill, patience and other qualities that you might have, surely will be no problem for you!


These recipes are pretty impressive at targeting and shooting bubbles, so you can relay on them for the job, even more, here you'll get to discover all kind of bonuses which can help you clear the levels in real time.
Join in and you'll find a big map, with more than 99 levels which you'll have to pass, with different puzzles at each stage, this surely will get you intrigued. Prove that you have the skill to pass each one and make sure to calculate your moves perfectly or you might end up loosing a life!

With high quallity graphics, lots of sound effects and an exciting game play this bubble popper puzzle app will remain on your mobile device for a while. Share the app with your friends and find out who can score better!

Game Features:
• Get hours of fun with tons of addicting levels!
• Shop to buy upgrades using your in-game tips!
• Free & easy to play, challenging to master!
• Hundreds of ingredient bubble shooting levels!
• More levels added every week!
